name: *:･ﾟ✧*:･ﾟ✧
description:
This game was made for the FLATJAM2017.

Use WASD or direction arrows to move.

It is a collection of texts I exchanged with my best friend a couple years ago. They do not come from the same conversations but my memory made it that they could all make sense together, too.

Sounds made thanks to Bosca Coeil
Half the scripts were written under the supervision of molo
Everything else is made by me!
